com.imaginea.android.sugarcrm.util

Class SimpleMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.imaginea.android.sugarcrm.util.SimpleMenu

  • public class SimpleMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    A really dumb implementation of the Menu interface, that's only useful for our old-actionbar purposes. See com.android.internal.view.menu.MenuBuilder in AOSP for a more complete implementation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Instantiates a new simple menu.
